title: So many bugs this patch hahahha
body:
Im not gonna go on a rant because honestly the glitches were funny asf. So here are the 3 bugs that I've seen so far.

Blitcrank Q'ed Mf over the wall but Mf stopped halfway LOL

Yasuo windwalled and jhin ult still went through 

Ahri used zhonyas but zed's ult still killed her even though she was in zhonya state when the pop happened.

Edit 1:
Blitzcrank's Q twisted to another direction to hook me.

My ult showed no cd but I could not use it

replies.body:
Blitzcrank hook almost 90 degree turn to hook cait during net.

250+ armor on singed thornmail showed 0 bonus rendering it useless

Heimer ulti turret not targetting champs sometimes.

Blitzcrank pull at heimer as Heimer puts a turret down, turret goes on cd, no turret put down and blitz pulls heimer
